attributes.action: Legislate against the use of Archive File material pertaining to Younger Persons Anti Social behaviour age 15-21  being flighted on UK News channels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Block The use of Major broadcasters in flighting archived or file material when broadcasting newsstories on anti social behaviour. Footage live or of the same day  of actual behaviour when covering these news story should only  be deemed accesible and relevant.
Outdated material does not allow for the Town and individuals to move on and improve , or future innovate to develop the Town , village or individuals betterand be part of their improvement programmes.
It also may  not allow for a correct Parliamentry assesment and decision  in terms of the Town or village securing Parliamentry aid.

rejection.details: Please provide your full name when submitting a petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
